  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

## Municipalities

```{r municipality_map}
library(ows4R)
library(gisfin)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

shape <- gisfin::get_municipalities(year = 2019)
ggplot(shape) + geom_sf(aes(fill = kunta)) + theme(legend.position = "none")
```

## Zipcodes


```{r zipcode_map}
shape <- gisfin::get_zipcodes(year = 2019)
ggplot(shape) + geom_sf(aes(fill = he_kika)) + theme(legend.position = "none")
```
